scenario.name: Bob UAS
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:example.com SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "Bob" <sip:bob@example.com>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:bob@example.com> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 REGISTER Contact: sip:bob@[local_ip]:[local_port] Expires: 3600 Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]

REGISTER sip:example.com SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "Bob" <sip:bob@example.com>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:bob@example.com> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 REGISTER [authentication username=bob password=bob] Expires: 3600 Contact: sip:bob@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
